g100m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 100000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

g50m_le100m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 50000000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 100000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

g25m_le50m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 25000000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 50000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

g10m_le25m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) > 10000000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 25000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

ge1m_le10m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) >= 1000000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay,0) <= 10000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

less1m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay,0) < 1000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_ytd_g250k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay_ytd,0) > 250000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_ytd_g101k_le250k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay_ytd,0) > 100000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay_ytd,0) <= 250000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_ytd_g21k_le50k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay_ytd,0) > 20000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay_ytd,0) <= 50000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_ytd_less20k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay_ytd,0) < 20000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_cytd_g51k_le100k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay_cytd,0) > 50000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay_cytd,0) <= 100000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_cytd_g21k_le50k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay_cytd,0) > 20000 AND COALESCE(gross_pay_cytd,0) <= 50000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

gross_pay_cytd_less20k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(gross_pay_cytd,0) < 20000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

overtime_pay_g250k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(overtime_pay,0) > 250000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

overtime_pay_g101k_le250k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(overtime_pay,0) > 100000 AND COALESCE(overtime_pay,0) <= 250000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

overtime_pay_g51k_le100k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(overtime_pay,0) > 50000 AND COALESCE(overtime_pay,0) <= 100000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

annual_salary_g101k_le250k_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(annual_salary,0) > 100000 AND COALESCE(annual_salary,0) <= 250000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
